job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and enhancement of platforms that utilize Large Language Models (LLMs), which is a core aspect of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical application and upkeep of the developed AI tools, encompassing aspects of software maintenance and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process
job_tasks.justification: This is a specific example of building a user-facing application (an assistant) with a clear software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: This involves evaluating and incorporating advanced AI technologies, which falls under the modeling and integration of AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows
job_tasks.justification: This involves enabling the use of technologies within workflows, which can be seen as a form of applied software development and enablement.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on performance, integration, and infrastructure, key elements of MLOps and system integration.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the operational aspect of supporting deployed solutions and maintaining service quality, which aligns with MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: redefine business standards and enhance productivity
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of business goals and the application of AI to achieve them.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This clearly outlines the business impact and strategic goals the role aims to achieve through AI.

soft_skills.phrase: forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI
troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets
providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies
ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues
significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, development, and integration of applications using LLMs and other generative AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision. It also mentions building user-facing assistants and providing support for their use within workflows, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
